Reviews.Title: Best phone by Boost Mobile
Reviews.Author: Lenora Harris
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing. The screen is big, bright and bold! Love the colors. It's fast, even when I'm not using my Wi-Fi. No dropped calls, nothing. I'm so glad I purchased this phone.

Reviews.Title: I LOOOOVE THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: giselle alvarez
Reviews.Content: The screen is perfect, it works super fast. Smart idea boost mobile. Worth every penny. I had this phone for about a month and I have not been dissappointed yet

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Josh Easterday
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! Looks and sounds great. Shipped and arrived quickly. I maybe still in the 'honeymoon phase' with this phone so I'll update later, but I love it so far. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: awsome phone.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Love this phone, at first I thought it was a little too big but after getting used to it I found it to be amazing. If you like watching movies or playing games then this is the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my daughter. She loves it. The bigger screen it great for game play and movie watching.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: kenneth hubbard
Reviews.Content: excellent !!!!!! this phone is everything and more that any one person could want to do all tasks that it promised.....

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Kenyetta "2ICE"
Reviews.Content: I love the bright display on this phone. I have only had it a few hours but so far I am pleased.
